      private void initialize()
      Initialize the contents of the frame. picOne sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/32952/sword picTwo sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/567997/viking_helmet picThree sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/206663/arrow

      public void displayOne(Monster monster)

      Parameters:

    • getWinnings

      public int getWinnings(ArrayList<Monster> monsters)
      Gets the winnings.
      Parameters:
      monsters - the potential enemy battle team
      Returns:
      the winnings, the gold awarded to the player if the battle with the team is won.
